critical_findings.impact: Content cannot be distributed - violates SEBI guidelines
critical_findings.required_action: Add mandatory disclaimers to ALL content

critical_findings.impact: Advisor registration not visible - mandatory SEBI requirement
Messages may be truncated or flagged as spam

critical_patterns.details: SIP education appears in 28.5% of content (exceeding 25% threshold)
Missing story hooks, statistical hooks completely

what_worked_well.learning: Clear content organization with consistent formatting
Excellent brand tagline and disclaimer consistency

critical_failures.failure: SEBI disclaimers not integrated into content generation templates
critical_failures.root_cause: Content generation prompts missing mandatory compliance requirements

critical_failures.impact: Manual review required for all content
critical_failures.root_cause: Lack of engagement hooks and personalization in templates

process_gaps_identified.description: Compliance validation happens after content generation
process_gaps_identified.recommendation: Integrate compliance rules into content generation prompts

process_gaps_identified.description: No quality thresholds enforced before distribution
process_gaps_identified.recommendation: Implement quality gates with auto-rejection below 70/100

process_gaps_identified.description: No systematic topic and messaging diversity strategy
process_gaps_identified.recommendation: Implement content calendar with topic rotation rules

process_gaps_identified.description: No feedback loop from validation back to content generation
process_gaps_identified.recommendation: Create feedback integration system for continuous improvement

success_patterns.description: Clear sections and bullet points improve readability

immediate_critical_fixes.details: Add mandatory SEBI disclaimers to all content generation prompts
immediate_critical_fixes.implementation: Update LinkedIn and WhatsApp message templates
immediate_critical_fixes.validation: Re-run compliance validation on updated templates

immediate_critical_fixes.details: Add prominent ARN number display in format 'ARN: [NUMBER]'
immediate_critical_fixes.implementation: Update brand customizer to inject ARN prominently
immediate_critical_fixes.validation: Verify ARN visibility in all branded content

immediate_critical_fixes.details: Ensure all WhatsApp messages under 400 characters
immediate_critical_fixes.implementation: Add length constraints to WhatsApp generation
immediate_critical_fixes.validation: Character count validation in content pipeline

specific_actions: Add compelling question hooks to 80% of content
high_priority_quality_improvements.measurement_method: Re-run quality scorer on sample content

specific_actions: Add 'How to' sections with 3-5 actionable steps
Add Pro Tips and insider insights
Reference current market data and trends
high_priority_quality_improvements.measurement_method: Content depth analysis and user feedback

specific_actions: Increase advisor name mentions to 2-3 times per post
Customize content complexity for target audience
Add personal stories and client examples

medium_priority_content_diversity.details: Reduce SIP education from 28.5% to <20% of content
implementation: Create content calendar with topic rotation
Add insurance, retirement planning, goal-based investing
Introduce story-based content and statistical insights

medium_priority_content_diversity.details: Add missing hook types: stories, statistics, myth-busting
implementation: Create template variations for each hook type
Add client success stories and market data

medium_priority_content_diversity.details: Reduce repetitive phrases like 'Keep calm, keep investing'
implementation: Monitor phrase frequency in content batches
medium_priority_content_diversity.success_metric: No phrase appears >3 times per 20 content pieces

compliance_rules_enhanced.rule: All financial content must include: 'Mutual fund investments are subject to market risks', 'Read all scheme related documents carefully', 'Past performance may not be sustained in future'
ARN number must be displayed prominently as 'ARN: [NUMBER]' in all advisor content
WhatsApp messages must not exceed 400 characters including disclaimers

quality_thresholds_established.action: Return to content generation with specific improvement instructions

feedback_integration_recommendations.integration_method: Real-time quality gate with improvement suggestions

pre_generation_checklist: Verify SEBI disclaimer integration in templates
Confirm ARN display requirements in brand guidelines
continuous_improvement_focus: Track quality score progression toward 75+ average
Assess engagement improvements through actual distribution metrics

files_created_updated.purpose: Session learning capture and improvement recommendations

critical_updates_required: Update content generation templates with SEBI compliance
Implement ARN display in brand customizer
Add quality gates to orchestration workflow
validation_readiness: Test updated templates with compliance validator
Verify quality improvements with sample content
Validate topic diversity with content calendar
success_criteria: 85+ freshness score with no concentration violations
